Uses of Class
com.mashery.trafficmanager.cache.CacheException

  • Packages that use CacheException 
    Package Description
    com.mashery.trafficmanager.cache
    The package contains classes which provide APIs to the custom processors to add/remove/update entries in the cache.

    • Uses of CacheException in com.mashery.trafficmanager.cache

      Retrieves the value from the cache for the given key

      Returns the cache created with the given name

      Puts the value against the key in the cache for a given ttl
      void CacheService.releaseCache(String name)
      Removes the cache from the registry
